page.title: 07LIFE STYLE
page.content: MY daddy is a pilot. He gets up and has breakfast. After breakfast he rings the air-port to say he is leaving. He has a two hour journey because we live seventy miles from Dublin airport. When he is at the airport he looks at the weather maps. Next he finds out which aeroplane he is flying. He gets a black case with all the maps and goes to the aeroplane an hour before take-off. He flies to Shannon and has a stop there and stays for an hour before flying to Boston and on to New York. He rests there one night and flies back to Dublin via Boston and Shannon. He comes home and sleeps because he has flown through the night.
